amendment.description: An amendment, printed in the Congressional Record of July 26, as amendment No. 64, to add the Fair Housing Initiative Program, authorized by the Housing and Community Development Act of 1987, as a program to receive funds appropriated in the bill for Fair Housing Activities.

action.text: Mr. Lazio raised a point of order against the Stokes amendment (A008). Mr. Lazio stated that the amendment appropriates funds for unauthorized programs and is therefore not in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
